## FileSystem.move() method

Moves a file. The folder must exist, unless the `ensureFolderExists` option is provided. Behind the scenes it uses `fs-extra.moveSync()`

**Signature:**

```typescript
static move(options: IFileSystemMoveOptions): void;
```
